channel.title: Comments on: Irish Govt to pump â‚¬500 million into Venture Funds

item.title: By: brendan lally
item.dc:creator: brendan lally
item.description:
Hmmm.
Devils in the details but past results from these type of entrepreneur/startup 'funds' havn't been very encouraging.
Mostly they don't reach low enough 2 encourage 'early' startup progression.
item.content:encoded:
Hmmm.

Devils in the details but past results from these type of entrepreneur/startup ‘funds’ havn’t been very encouraging.

Mostly they don’t reach low enough 2 encourage ‘early’ startup progression.

item.title: By: Chuck
item.dc:creator: Chuck
item.description: Good to see Ireland pumping money into new businesses. Hopefully it gives the country a shot in the arm and points them in the right direction.
item.content:encoded: Good to see Ireland pumping money into new businesses. Hopefully it gives the country a shot in the arm and points them in the right direction.
